scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:deps && npm run clean:dist
scripts.clean:deps: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json backend/package-lock.json
scripts.fresh:install: npm run clean:deps && npm run install:all
scripts.fresh:build: npm run clean && npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.test:production: npm run fresh:build && npm run preview:frontend
